*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to José Antonio Navarro, February 27, 1827. Buying certain merchandise for Navarro.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="02-27-1827">27 of Feby 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Sr. Jose Antonio Navarro*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Exteemed *person_mentioned*Friend*/person_mentioned*:—*/p* *p*I received of *person_mentioned*Corporal Sosa*/person_mentioned* the One hundred and thirty dollars that you sent to me and the letter with a note to buy for you tres arrobas [75 lbs] of coffee and powder.*/p*
*p*According to what you write I ordered coffee from *location_mentioned*Orleans */location_mentioned*in conformity with the note you sent to me, and I am expecting the return of the Schooner every day, it should have arrived before this, and it is probable it will be here soon. With this intelligence I have bought the three arrobas of Coffee which I send by *person_mentioned*Corporal Sosa*/person_mentioned* the price was 30 cents per pound which makes $22.50 for the 75 lbs. It was not possible to secure it for less and I have taken all there is for sale here.*/p*
*p*The rest of the money that I have 97 Dollars and 50 cents I have kept in order to pay for the merchandise from *location_mentioned*Orleans */location_mentioned*and I will pay what is lacking or short. I shall advise you as soon as I receive notice of the arrival of the freight.*/p*
*p*I have advised *person_mentioned*Mr. Jones*/person_mentioned* that you would not admit the contract for the corn, I think he will take 20 reales per fanega [3 bushels.]*/p*
*p*If a good assortment of clothing arrives I shall advise you and you can command me frankly and with liberty as a sincere friend in anything that is of use, and I shall at all times take great pleasure in executing your orders, if you stand on ceremony I shall be very sorry.*/p*
*p*At present there is absolutely no merchandise for sale here but we are expecting some in a few days.*/p*
*p*Your friend *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
